A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: I was disappointed with a few small details (and one big one) but while I didn't like the \"out with the old\, in with the new and young\" theme throughout\, there were so many other things I absolutely loved\, and I was thrilled to see it didn't go in the direction the confusing trailers initially showed. Humor and action were amped up\, and I can't wait to see what happens next!
